akn:section.akn:heading: Excessive and habitual use of intoxicants

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 7352. Excessive and habitual use of intoxicants An individual who habitually uses intoxicating beverages to excess may not be employed in the competitive service. (Pub. L. 89–554, Sept. 6, 1966, 80 Stat. 527.)
Historical and Revision Notes
DerivationU.S. CodeRevised Statutes andStatutes at Large
5 U.S.C. 640.Jan. 16, 1883, ch. 27, § 8, 22 Stat. 406.
The word “employed” is substituted for “appointed to, or retained in” because it includes both. Standard changes are made to conform with the definitions applicable and the style of this title as outlined in the preface to the report.
